name: Blue Mountains & Jenolan Caves - Full Day Tour
description: The Blue Mountains Area is a World Heritage Area by UNESCO listed in 2000. Just 90 minutes from Sydney by car, it has some of the country’s most dazzling spectacular wonders and a full complement of creature comforts including fine food, gorgeous villages, festivals and great places to spend a day. The Blue Mountains are popular with hikers and climbers as well as day trippers.
